tidbits.title: Buddhist Temples
tidbits.description: Thailand is home to magnificent Buddhist temples, such as Wat Pho and Wat Arun in Bangkok, showcasing exquisite architecture and spiritual significance.

tidbits.title: Cuisine and Street Food
tidbits.description: Thai cuisine, known for its vibrant flavors, is celebrated worldwide. Street food culture thrives, offering an array of delicious and affordable dishes.

tidbits.title: Exotic Islands and Beaches
tidbits.description: The country boasts stunning islands and beaches like Phuket, Koh Samui, and Phi Phi Islands, attracting tourists with their picturesque landscapes and crystal-clear waters.
